mapper.select: SELECT A.TASK_NM , A.MAIL_TITLE , B.CAMP_NM , C.SEG_NM , D.SEND_DT , D.END_DT , E.CD_NM CAMP_TY FROM NEO_TASK A , NEO_CAMPAIGN B , NEO_SEGMENT C , NEO_SUBTASK D , (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang} AND USE_YN = 'Y') E WHERE A.CAMP_NO = B.CAMP_NO AND A.SEG_NO = C.SEG_NO AND A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO AND A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND D.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND A.CAMP_TY = E.CD

SELECT A.STEP1 , A.STEP2 , NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2 , A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2(+) ORDER BY A.STEP1, A.STEP2

SELECT AA.STEP1 , AA.NM_STEP1 , AA.CNT_STEP1 , BB.STEP2 , BB.NM_STEP2 , BB.CNT_STEP2 , CC.RCODE_STEP3 AS STEP3 , NVL(CC.NM_STEP3,'') AS NM_STEP3 , NVL(CC.CNT_STEP3,0) AS CNT_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.STEP1, NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP1, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP1 FROM (SELECT STEP1, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '001' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1 ) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) ) AA, ( SELECT A.STEP1, A.STEP2, NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM (SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2(+) ) BB, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(CNT_STEP3) AS CNT_STEP3, NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.RCODE_STEP1, A.RCODE_STEP2, A.RCODE_STEP3, NVL(A.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP3, NVL(B.CD_DESC, 'Etc') AS NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3 ) A, (SELECT STEP1, STEP2, STEP3, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '003' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) B WHERE A.RCODE_STEP1 = B.STEP1(+) AND A.RCODE_STEP2 = B.STEP2(+) AND A.RCODE_STEP3 = B.STEP3(+) ) C GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, NM_STEP3 ) CC WHERE AA.STEP1 = BB.STEP1 AND BB.STEP1 = CC.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND BB.STEP2 = CC.RCODE_STEP2(+) ORDER BY AA.STEP1, BB.STEP2, CC.RCODE_STEP3

SELECT CUST_DOMAIN DOMAIN_NM , SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN (SEND_RCODE != '000' AND RCODE_STEP1 = '002') THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_CNT FROM NEO_AR_DOMAINLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY CUST_DOMAIN ORDER BY SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') AS SEND_TIME , NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT), 0) AS SEND_CNT , NVL(SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)), 0) AS SUCC_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER () TOTAL_COUNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) B WHERE A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A , ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) B WHERE A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RESP_TIME , SUCC_CNT , OPEN_CNT , CLICK_CNT , VALID_CNT , BLOCK_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Y.RESP_TIME) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND SEND_RCODE = '000' ) X, ( SELECT RESP_TIME, NVL(SUM(OPEN_CNT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, NVL(SUM(CLICK_CNT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, NVL(SUM(VALID_CNT),0) AS VALID_CNT, NVL(SUM(BLOCK_CNT),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , NVL(SUM(AA.RESP_AR_AMT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, 0 AS CLICK_CNT, 0 AS VALID_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN AA.BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN AA.RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , 0 AS OPEN_CNT, NVL(SUM(AA.CLICK_AR_AMT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, NVL(SUM(AA.VALID_AR_AMT),0) AS VALID_CNT, 0 AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) GROUP BY RESP_TIME ) Y ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO , NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO , NEO_SUBTASK.SEND_DT , NEO_TASK.TASK_NM , NEO_SEGMENT.SEG_NM , NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM((CASE WHEN NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT END)),0) AS SUC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG , NEO_SUBTASK , NEO_TASK , NEO_SEGMENT WHERE NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = NEO_TASK.TASK_NO AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = NEO_SUBTASK.TASK_NO AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO = NEO_SUBTASK.SUB_TASK_NO AND NEO_TASK.SEG_NO = NEO_SEGMENT.SEG_NO AND
( NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = #{joinKey.taskNo} AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO = #{joinKey.subTaskNo} )
GROUP BY NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO , NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO , NEO_SUBTASK.SEND_DT , NEO_TASK.TASK_NM , NEO_SEGMENT.SEG_NM ORDER BY NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO DESC, NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO DESC

SELECT A.STEP1 , A.STEP2 , NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2 , A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND
( NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = #{joinKey.taskNo} AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO = #{joinKey.subTaskNo} )
GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2(+) ORDER BY A.STEP1, A.STEP2

SELECT A.TASK_NM , B.CAMP_NM , C.SEG_NM , D.SEND_DT , D.END_DT , E.CD_NM CAMP_TY FROM NEO_TASK A , NEO_CAMPAIGN B , NEO_SEGMENT C , (SELECT TASK_NO, MIN(SEND_DT) AS SEND_DT, MAX(END_DT) AS END_DT FROM NEO_SUBTASK GROUP BY TASK_NO) D , (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang} AND USE_YN = 'Y') E WHERE A.CAMP_NO = B.CAMP_NO AND A.SEG_NO = C.SEG_NO AND A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO AND A.CAMP_TY = E.CD

SELECT SEND_CNT , SUCC_CNT , (SEND_CNT - SUCC_CNT) AS FAIL_CNT , OPEN_CNT , VALID_CNT , CLICK_CNT , BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) SEND_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} ) A, ( SELECT NVL(SUM(RESP_AR_AMT),0) OPEN_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} ) B, ( SELECT NVL(SUM(CLICK_AR_AMT),0) CLICK_CNT , NVL(SUM(VALID_AR_AMT),0) VALID_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} ) D

SELECT A.STEP1 , A.STEP2 , NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2 , A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2(+) ORDER BY A.STEP1, A.STEP2

SELECT AA.STEP1 , AA.NM_STEP1 , AA.CNT_STEP1 , BB.STEP2 , BB.NM_STEP2 , BB.CNT_STEP2 , CC.RCODE_STEP3 AS STEP3 , NVL(CC.NM_STEP3,'') AS NM_STEP3 , NVL(CC.CNT_STEP3,0) AS CNT_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.STEP1, NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP1, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP1 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '001' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1 ) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) ) AA, ( SELECT A.STEP1, A.STEP2, NVL(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B WHERE A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2(+) ) BB, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(CNT_STEP3) AS CNT_STEP3, NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.RCODE_STEP1, A.RCODE_STEP2, A.RCODE_STEP3, NVL(A.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP3, NVL(B.CD_DESC, 'Etc') AS NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3 ) A, ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, STEP3, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '003' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) B WHERE A.RCODE_STEP1 = B.STEP1(+) AND A.RCODE_STEP2 = B.STEP2(+) AND A.RCODE_STEP3 = B.STEP3(+) ) C GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, NM_STEP3 ) CC WHERE AA.STEP1 = BB.STEP1 AND BB.STEP1 = CC.RCODE_STEP1(+) AND BB.STEP2 = CC.RCODE_STEP2(+) ORDER BY AA.STEP1, BB.STEP2, CC.RCODE_STEP3

SELECT CUST_DOMAIN DOMAIN_NM , SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN (SEND_RCODE != '000' AND RCODE_STEP1 = '002') THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_CNT FROM NEO_AR_DOMAINLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} GROUP BY CUST_DOMAIN ORDER BY SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') AS SEND_TIME , NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT), 0) AS SEND_CNT , NVL(SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)), 0) AS SUCC_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER () TOTAL_COUNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) B WHERE A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A , ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) B WHERE A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RESP_TIME , SUCC_CNT , OPEN_CNT , CLICK_CNT , VALID_CNT , BLOCK_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Y.RESP_TIME) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SEND_RCODE = '000' ) X, ( SELECT RESP_TIME, NVL(SUM(OPEN_CNT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, NVL(SUM(CLICK_CNT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, NVL(SUM(VALID_CNT),0) AS VALID_CNT, NVL(SUM(BLOCK_CNT),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , NVL(SUM(AA.RESP_AR_AMT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, 0 AS CLICK_CNT, 0 AS VALID_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN AA.BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN AA.RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , 0 AS OPEN_CNT, NVL(SUM(AA.CLICK_AR_AMT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, NVL(SUM(AA.VALID_AR_AMT),0) AS VALID_CNT, 0 AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) GROUP BY RESP_TIME ) Y ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT SUCC_CNT, OPEN_CNT, CLICK_CNT, VALID_CNT, BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SEND_RCODE = '000' ) X, ( SELECT SUM(OPEN_CNT) AS OPEN_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT) AS CLICK_CNT, SUM(VALID_CNT) AS VALID_CNT, SUM(BLOCK_CNT) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(AA.RESP_AR_AMT) AS OPEN_CNT, 0 AS CLICK_CNT, 0 AS VALID_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN AA.RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS OPEN_CNT, SUM(AA.CLICK_AR_AMT) AS CLICK_CNT, SUM(AA.VALID_AR_AMT) AS VALID_CNT, 0 AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID ) YY ) Y

SELECT A.CAMP_NM , A.REG_DT , B.DEPT_NM , C.USER_NM , D.CD_NM AS CAMP_TY FROM NEO_CAMPAIGN A, NEO_DEPT B, NEO_USER C, (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) D WHERE A.CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.CAMP_TY = D.CD

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.TASK_NO , NVL(SEND_CNT,0) AS SEND_CNT , NVL(SUCC_CNT,0) AS SUCC_CNT , NVL(OPEN_CNT,0) AS OPEN_CNT , NVL(VALID_CNT,0) AS VALID_CNT , NVL(CLICK_CNT,0) AS CLICK_CNT , NVL(BLOCK_CNT,0) AS BLOCK_CNT , NVL(E.SEND_REPEAT,'000') AS SEND_REPEAT , E.TASK_NM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.TASK_NO DESC) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT TASK_NO, NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) SEND_CNT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) A, ( SELECT TASK_NO, NVL(SUM(RESP_AR_AMT),0) OPEN_CNT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) B, ( SELECT TASK_NO, NVL(SUM(CLICK_AR_AMT),0) CLICK_CNT, NVL(SUM(VALID_AR_AMT),0) VALID_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) D, NEO_TASK E WHERE A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO(+) AND A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO(+) AND A.TASK_NO = E.TASK_NO ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT SUM(SEND_CNT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(OPEN_CNT) AS OPEN_CNT , SUM(VALID_CNT) AS VALID_CNT , SUM(CLICK_CNT) AS CLICK_CNT , SUM(BLOCK_CNT) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT TASK_NO, NVL(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) SEND_CNT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) A, ( SELECT TASK_NO, NVL(SUM(RESP_AR_AMT),0) OPEN_CNT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) B, ( SELECT TASK_NO, NVL(SUM(CLICK_AR_AMT),0) CLICK_CNT, NVL(SUM(VALID_AR_AMT),0) VALID_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO) D, NEO_TASK E WHERE A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO(+) AND A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO(+) AND A.TASK_NO = E.TASK_NO
